title: "Recycling robot could help solve soft plastic waste crisis"
excerpt: "Despite an improvement in plastic recycling in recent years, landfill is a growing issue. Soft plastics like cling wrap and plastic bags are a major contributor to the problem, with 94 percent going to landfill in 2016-17."
